mapper.insert: insert into User (UsrSn, OwnerID, UsrName, UsrCode, UsrUrl, IsOrg, Email, Passwd, NeedNotify, CreateDate, UpdateDate) values (#{usrsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usrname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usrcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usrurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isorg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{neednotify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update User set OwnerID = #{ownerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UsrName = #{usrname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UsrCode = #{usrcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UsrUrl = #{usrurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IsOrg = #{isorg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Passwd = #{passwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NeedNotify = #{neednotify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CreateDate = #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UpdateDate = #{updatedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where UsrSn = #{usrsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select UsrSn, OwnerID, UsrName, UsrCode, UsrUrl, IsOrg, Email, Passwd, NeedNotify, CreateDate, UpdateDate from User where UsrSn = #{usrsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select UsrSn, OwnerID, UsrName, UsrCode, UsrUrl, IsOrg, Email, Passwd, NeedNotify, CreateDate, UpdateDate from User
select UsrSn, OwnerID, UsrName, UsrCode, UsrUrl, IsOrg, Email, Passwd, NeedNotify, CreateDate, UpdateDate from User where UsrName = #{usrname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
